enhanced_description: Zappyhire is an AI-powered, all-in-one recruitment platform designed by Talent Acquisition Experts to streamline and automate the hiring process. It features an Applicant Tracking System, Robotic Video Interviewing, and AI/ML-powered quick assessments for intelligent, unbiased candidate evaluation. The platform emphasizes seamless team collaboration to help organizations screen, engage, and hire top talent faster and more efficiently, while reducing costs and boosting hiring manager productivity.
